Settings.General.Category.Description: General settings for REST API Client Code Generator
Settings.General.JavaPath.Description: Full path to java.exe. Leave empty to get path from JAVA_HOME
Settings.General.NSwagPath.Description: Full path to NSwag.exe (Installs from NPM if not found)
Settings.General.SwaggerCodegenPath.Desc: Full path to Swagger Codegen JAR file
Settings.General.OpenApiGeneratorPath.De: Full path OpenAPI Generator JAR file
Settings.Analytics.TelemetryOptOut.Descr: Set to true to opt-out of telemetry. Default is false.
Settings.AutoRest.AddCredentials.Descrip: Include a credential property and constructor parameter supporting different authentication behaviors
Settings.AutoRest.OverrideClientName.Des: Overrides the name of the client class (usually derived from $.info.title) and use the document filename instead
Settings.AutoRest.UseInternalConstructor: Generate constructors with internal instead of public visibility (useful for convenience layers)
Settings.AutoRest.SyncMethods.Descriptio: Determines the amount of synchronous wrappers to generate (Default: Essential)
Settings.AutoRest.UseDateTimeOffset.Desc: Use DateTimeOffset instead of DateTime to model date/time types
Settings.AutoRest.ClientSideValidation.D: Whether to validate parameters at the client side (according to OpenAPI definition) before making a request (Default: True)
Settings.NSwag.InjectHttpClient.Descript: Set this to TRUE to generate the constructor that accepts HttpClient
Set this to TRUE to generate client interfaces
Settings.NSwag.GenerateDtoTypes.Descript: Set this to TRUE to generate DTO types
Settings.NSwag.UseBaseUrl.Description: Set this to TRUE to include a base URL for every HTTP request
Settings.NSwag.ClassStyle.Description: POCO (Plain Old C# Objects), Inpc (Implements INotifyPropertyChanged), Prism (Prism base class), Records (readonly POCO)
Settings.NSwag.UseDocumentTitle.Descript: Set this to TRUE to use the OpenAPI Document Info Title as the generated class name. Set this to FALSE to use the filename
Settings.NSwag.ParameterDateTimeFormat.D: Specifies the format for DateTime type method parameters (default: s)
Settings.NSwagStudio.InjectHttpClient.De: Set this to TRUE to generate the constructor that accepts HttpClient
Settings.NSwagStudio.GenerateClientInter: Set this to TRUE to generate client interfaces
Settings.NSwagStudio.GenerateDtoTypes.De: Set this to TRUE to generate DTO types
Settings.NSwagStudio.UseBaseUrl.Descript: Set this to TRUE to include a base URL for every HTTP request
Settings.NSwagStudio.ClassStyle.Descript: POCO (Plain Old C# Objects), Inpc (Implements INotifyPropertyChanged), Prism (Prism base class), Records (readonly POCO)
Settings.NSwagStudio.UseDocumentTitle.De: Set this to TRUE to use the OpenAPI Document Info Title as the generated class name. Set this to FALSE to use the filename
Settings.NSwagStudio.ParameterDateTimeFo: Specifies the format for DateTime type method parameters (default: s)
Settings.NSwagStudio.GenerateResponseCla: Set this to TRUE to generate response classes
Settings.NSwagStudio.GenerateJsonMethods: Set this to TRUE to generate JSON methods
Settings.NSwagStudio.RequiredPropertiesM: Set this to TRUE if required properties must be defined
Settings.NSwagStudio.GenerateDefaultValu: Set this to TRUE to generate default values
Settings.NSwagStudio.GenerateDataAnnotat: Set this to TRUE to generate data annotations
Settings.OpenApiGenerator.EmitDefaultVal: Set to True if the default value for a member should be generated in the serialization stream
Settings.OpenApiGenerator.MethodArgument: C# Optional method argument, e.g. void square(int x=10) (.net 4.0+ only)
Deserialize array types to Collection<T> instead of List<T>
Settings.OpenApiGenerator.UseDateTimeOff: Use DateTimeOffset to model date-time properties
Settings.OpenApiGenerator.CustomAddition: Setting this will override all the other additional properties
To skip models defined as the form parameters in 'requestBody'
Path to the folder containing the custom Mustache templates
Settings.OpenApiGenerator.UseConfigurati: Use the configuration file if present
Settings.OpenApiGenerator.GenerateMultip: Generate multiple files for each operation. This only works for SDK style projects
Settings.OpenApiGenerator.Version.Descri: The version of the generator to use
Sets the User-Agent header value to be sent in the HTTP request
Settings.Refitter.GenerateContracts.Desc: Set this to FALSE to skip generating the contract types (default: TRUE)
Settings.Refitter.GenerateXmlDocCodeComm: Set this to FALSE to skip generating XML doc style code comments (default: TRUE)
Settings.Refitter.AddAutoGeneratedHeader: Set this to FALSE to skip generating <auto-generated> headers in C# files (default: TRUE)
Settings.Refitter.ReturnIApiResponse.Des: Set this to TRUE to wrap the returned the contract types in IApiResponse<T> (default: FALSE)
Set this to TRUE to generate the API interface and contract types using the internal accessbility modifier (default: FALSE)
Set this to TRUE to generate the API interface with Cancellation Tokens (default: FALSE)
Settings.Refitter.GenerateHeaderParamete: Set this to TRUE to generate [Header] parameters (default: TRUE)
Set this to TRUE to generate multiple files (default: FALSE)
Settings.Kiota.GenerateMultipleFiles.Des: Generate multiple files for each operation. This only works for SDK style projects
Settings.Kiota.TypeAccessModifier.Descri: The access modifier for the generated types
Settings.Kiota.UsesBackingStore.Descript: Generate persistance code for Entity Framework
